texto: determining the objectives, top management should consider: a) to what extent the organization is aiming to be recognized by interested parties as: 1) a leader with respect to competitive factors (see 7.2) emphasizing the organization’s capability; 2) having a positive impact on economic, environmental and social conditions around it; b) the degree of the organization’s and its people’s engagement in society beyond immediate business- related topics (e.g. in national and international organizations, such as public administration, associations and standardization bodies).
